name: Motors VIN Decoder
author: StylemixThemes

sections.description:
Motors VIN Decoder & Vehicle History Check is free plugin to decode your vehicle VIN. Free version is based on USA National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) database. Decode a Vehicle Identification Number (VIN), obtain manufacturer data describing the vehicle basic information maintained by the USA government.

This version of the plugin uses NHTSA service to decode VIN numbers and provide vehicle information to a user. The service is free, and no extra setup needed. NHTSA — National Highway Traffic Safety Administration of US Department of Transportation provides FREE API Service for Car Specifications. Please note, NHTSA does not provide VIN History Data.

⭐ Motors VIN Decoder Pro
⭐ VIN Decoder Demo
⭐ Motors Premium Car Dealership & Classifieds Theme
⭐ Join Motors Facebook Community

VIN Decoder Pro Features

Pro version of Motos VIN Decoder plugin supports more vehicle data providers and features:

  • Decode VIN Number and vehicle trim
  • Check Vehicle history (mileage/odometer, service records, road accidents and other issues)*
  • Track Mileage/odometer*
  • Service Records*
  • Damage Check*
  • Theft Check*
  • Last Sale Price*

Features marked with asterisk (*) is subject for third party services that may be paid and available only in Pro version of the plugin.

Vhicle Data Providers Compatible with Motors VIN Decoder Pro

[VIN Audit](http://www.vinaudit.com/
VIN Audit allows you to get reports, with enhanced coverage of critical issues, without much cost. This includes problem and damage checks, active theft checks, past sale listings, and open line checks.

MarketCheck
Simply sign up for an API key and start getting data right away. MarketCheck has 300 VIN requests per month. Get the records of the year, make, model and every change occurred. The service includes new, used, certified, lease car types.

Vincario
Vindecoder.eu can decode make, model, model year, body, trim, engine, transmission and other car parts in Europe, US as well as on other markets.

Israel Vehicles Database
Israel Ministry of Transport and Road Safety Vehicles Database – Free database to Decode a Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) registered in the State of Israel. Obtain a vehicle history records maintained by the government of Israel.

USA National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA)
Completely FREE tool to Decode a Vehicle Identification Number (VIN). Obtain manufacturer data describing the vehicle basic information and history maintained by the USA government.

More Awesome Free Plugins by Stylemix

⭐ Cost Calculator & Price Estimation Plugin
⭐ Zoom Meetings and Webinars Plugin — eRoom
⭐ BookIt – a free booking calendar plugin
⭐ MasterStudy – All-in-One WordPress LMS Plugin
⭐ Free Classifieds and Listings Plugin – uListing

Shortcode

Insert the [stm_motors_vin_decoders] short code to page/post to display Motors Vin Decoder Input Field
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload Motors Vin Decoder plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Choose a provider that you want to use to gather vehicle�s data in settings page
  4. Place shortcode [stm_motors_vin_decoders] to page/post to display Motors Vin Decoder Input Field
sections.faq:
What is VIN Number and how to use it?

A VIN is composed of 17 characters (digits and capital letters) that act as a unique identifier for the vehicle. A VIN displays the car’s unique features, specifications and manufacturer. The VIN can be used to track recalls, registrations, warranty claims, thefts and insurance coverage.

How Motors VIN Decoder Plugin Works?

When you enter a VIN number the plugin send request to a selected vehicle data provider, then shows the information on your website. You can decode VIN numbers, as well as check vehicle history records that is maintained by respective government authorities and/or third party services.

  • fixed: non-static method cannot be called statically error

sections.reviews:
Great VIN Lookup Plugin

By jollygreen on September 7, 2022

Great VIN plugin. Seems to work well so far and code is lightweight. It passes Googles CWV lighthouse tests with scores in the 90s+. Going to try the Pro version soon! See their demo to test for yourself on their website. Seems like a lot of the other comments are having trouble with 3rd party resources.

Not working And No Support

By Ariel Ferdman (arielfe) on July 13, 2021

I would warmly suggest to stay away.

Barely works and support is garbage

By jeygifford on April 20, 2021

I paid for the premium on this plugin and it still takes 4 or 5 days for a response. The plugin pulls info from the sources, but doesn't populate anything with the information. This plugin, and the associated templates need a LOT of work before they would be worth any money. I asked for a refund, and guess what? Never heard back.

No support

By joe (acmepetco) on April 16, 2021

Vin decoder worked fine for a while then it stopped. I am using it in a automotive theme from Gorilla themes. I have contacted Gorilla themes numerous time over months no support no answers no help whatsoever. I paid for premium support from WordPress the support people could not figure it out either also reached out to Gorilla themes to no avail. I even bought a new theme from Gorilla themes still doesn't work still no support. I believe my problem is with gorilla themes not necessarily the Vin decoder. regardless the site doesn't work and there's no support. I would have expected more from WordPress in so far as they are selling these products with no support. Very disappointed

Bad experienced and let me downed

By canet1 on April 11, 2021

was to be use for my client. Too much bugs All the codes supplied was nonfunctions beware!
